    Deeper personalization

    Make every customer feel like your favorite customer

    Klaviyo’s built-in CDP acts as one big brain for your entire tech stack, so you can make every customer interaction more meaningful.

    • Deliver more engaging experiences with deeper personalization, richer insights, and faster execution.
    • 350+ integrations and flexible APIs centralize all your data for easy activation and marketing automation.
    • Build super-specific audience segments in seconds with any data, from any source, across all time.
    Omnichannel automation

    Call the shots across channels

    Unify email, SMS, mobile push, and WhatsApp to reach customers when they’re most engaged and maximize revenue across every channel.

    • Send super-relevant messages at key moments with easy-to-set-up multi-channel flows.
    • NEW Use the omnichannel campaign builder to create and send multi-step, multi-channel campaigns all from one place.
    • Boost engagement and conversions with AI-powered channel affinity that chooses the best channel for each customer.
    • Set up triggered messages that send at the perfect time based on customer data and real-time behavior.

    • New Jumpstart your marketing. K:AI Marketing Agent builds your custom strategy and ready-to-go campaigns, flows, and forms that stay on brand and keep growing with your business.
    • New Bring the power of autonomous AI to web chat and SMS (and soon email and WhatsApp too). K:AI Customer Agent gives your customers a 24/7 personal shopping and service assistant, boosting satisfaction and sales.
    • Automatically reach each customer on their preferred channel, at the moment they’re most likely to engage.
    • Hone experiences quickly with hands-off testing for forms and campaign personalization.
    • Make sure emails land in the inbox with automatic sending reputation repair.

    Klaviyo Data Platform

    Marketing automation platform FAQs

    Marketing automation helps you complete tasks across your entire customer experience without having to be hands-on. With Klaviyo’s intelligent marketing automation software, you can automate personalized content with your data—without pressing send—and get a complete view of every customer. For example, build cross-channel experiences with email, SMS, and push notifications in the same flow, all with consolidated reports in one place.

    A marketing automation platform is software that acts as an engine to power your marketing. Klaviyo’s AI-powered marketing automation platform enables your business to automatically perform routine marketing tasks, so you can deliver timely messages with deep personalization.

    Marketing automation works when customers take certain actions like joining a list, getting added to a segment, or making a purchase. With Klaviyo’s 350+ integrations, you can easily connect and sync your data from your favorite platforms and incorporate them into your marketing automations. Use webhooks to trigger real-time processes in any other tool in your tech stack that you’ve integrated with Klaviyo.

    Marketing automation software is used by both small and large businesses. The Klaviyo intelligent marketing automation platform is built to scale brands of all kinds in addition to marketing teams, sales teams, and content managers.

    Picking the best marketing automation platform depends on factors such as how complex your marketing program is or which marketing automation features you can’t live without. Klaviyo offers scalable solutions across email, SMS, mobile push, and reviews—so you can automate growth across your tech stack.

    *This product is currently offered as a paid private beta. All features and functionalities including those labeled as “Coming Soon,” “Beta,” “Private Beta,” or “Limited Beta” are subject to change or removal at Klaviyo’s sole discretion and should not be relied upon to make any purchasing, financial, or implementation decisions. Access and availability are not guaranteed and may be limited.
